div.div: χρύ̄σεος, χρύ̄σειος : of gold, golden, adorned with gold, Od. 4.14 (see cut No. 2). Of color, ἔθειραι, νέφεα, Θ 42, Il. 13.523. The word is esp. applied to things worn or used by the gods. χρῡσέη, χρῡσέῳ, etc., pronounced with synizesis.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
